column4: i got a netgear pcmcia card and ubuntu detected it at once but i cant DHCP to my router with ssid off and wep
iwconfig show the Access Point MAC? or just 44:44:44:44:44 or FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF ?
they all suck. WPA would be better. MAC is so easy to fake. and WEP can be crack in 2 sec with 1/2 mill packets
i only use WEP for my network. safe enough.
does iwconfig shows that you are connected to the AP? the Access Point: MAC
with ssid broadcasting and using wep
did you setup iwconfig ath0 essid any or essid <YOUR ESSID>?
i used the network-admin panel under Administration
im not more than 2 feet away from AP
